trans-unit.source: Provides design-time visual support for <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> controls.

The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner> class is the abstract base class for both <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>, which all the other zone designers inherit from.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>類別是抽象的基底類別，同時<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebPartZoneBaseDesigner>和<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.ToolZoneDesigner>，繼承自的所有其他區域設計工具。

trans-unit.source: By inheriting directly from <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> instead of <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>, it allows implementations of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A> method that do not automatically clear the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A> collection, thus enabling the designer to render exceptions from child controls.
trans-unit.target: 藉由直接從繼承<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner>而不是<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.CompositeControlDesigner>，它可讓實作<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.GetDesignTimeHtml%2A>方法不會自動清除<xref:System.Web.UI.Control.Controls%2A>集合，因此讓設計工具，以呈現子控制項的例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: Like other designers in this namespace, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner> overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A> property to always return `true`.
trans-unit.target: 要在這個命名空間中的其他設計工具<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner>會覆寫<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner.UsePreviewControl%2A>屬性一律傳回`true`。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner" /> class does not have a public constructor, so you cannot inherit from it directly outside the <see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts" /> namespace.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts.WebZoneDesigner" />類別沒有公用建構函式，因此您無法繼承自它直接外部<see cref="N:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.WebParts" />命名空間。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> control associated with the designer.
Creates an instance of the designer bound to the associated <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebZone" /> control.
Gets a value indicating whether the designer should use a temporary copy rather than the actual control associated with the designer to generate the design-time markup.
